definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ec 1:11 memorial, remembrance (cf. Lg:BN 199, 200)—abs. [[זִכָּרוֹן]] Jos 4:7 +; [[זִכָּרׂן]] Ex 28:12, Ex 28:12, Ex 28:29; cstr. [[זִכְרוֹן]] Ec 1:11 + 2 t.; sf. [[זִכְרוֹנֵח]] Is 57:8; pl. [[הַזִּכְרׂנוֹת]] Es 6:1; sf. [[זִכְרׂנֵיכֶם]] Job 13:12; —

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: memorial-objects, altar-plates Nu 17:5 (P); stones in Jordan Jos 4:7 (JE); crowns in temple Zec 6:14; ´[[ז]] in Is 57:8 is symbol of strange god (Di), or perh. phallus-image, as sign of harlot (Che), cf. > Du (who prop. [[זְכָרוֹן]], from [[זׇכָר]]).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: memorial-record; in a book Ex 17:14 (E); cf. [[סֵפֶר זִכָּרוֹן]] Mal Mal 3:16, [[הַזִּכְרׂנות דברי הימים]] ´[[ס]] Es 6:1; memorial, as proof of citizenship Ne 2:20 (‖[[חֵלֶק]], [[חְדָקָה]]); reminder of Israel, ´[[לִפְנֵי י]], of [[כֶּסֶף הַכִּפֻּרִים]] Ex 30:16; spoils of war Nu 31:54; inscribed stones of ephod Ex 28:12, Ex 28:29, called ´[[אַבְנֵי ז]] v:Ex 28:12 = Ex 39:7; blowing of trumpets Nu 10:10 (foregoing all P), cf. [[זִכְרוֹן]] [[תְּרוּעַה]] Le 23:24 (H; where, however, no ´[[לפני י]], v. Di); [[זכרון]]([[ה]])[[מִנְחַת ]] Nu 5:15, Nu 5:18 (P); memorial-sentence, apophthegm Job 13:12.
remembrance Ec 1:11 (cstr. before prep. Ges:§ 130, 1), v:Ec 1:11 Ec 2:16.
